MARKETPLACE.dealRequest:
## {{ name }}

If you would like to take advantage of this exclusive Member offer, or would like to know a bit more about it, confirm your interest below.

We will forward your contact details and Member ID to **{{ affiliate.name }}** and they will contact you within 2 working days with further details.

This is just to register you interest and there's no obligation on your part to proceed, unless you decide to.

Join.Exciting: an exciting new organisation that has been exclusively created to support both independent and group restaurants, and affect positive change within the industry.
Join.ToActivate: To activate your no-cost membership and join
Join.Step1: Set up your contact details by completing the form on this page, and click 'Join The Collective'.
Join.Step2: Adopt your restaurant using our quick-search.
Join.Step3: Validate the information we hold and start enjoying the many benefits and savings of being part of the collective.
Join.Problems: If you experience any problems activating your membership then do please
Join.ValidEmail: A valid email address is required
Join.ValidTelephone: A valid telephone number is required
Join.Confirm: By submitting this form you are also confirming acceptance of our
Join.Part: If you would like your restaurant to be part of the
Join.Enjoy: and enjoy the many benefits and savings that are available to its members, please complete the following steps:
Join.Free1: Set up your user details by completing and submitting the form on this page, and click 'Join The Collective'.
Join.Free2: Check your email. You will receive confirmation from us with a password and a SIGN IN link.
Join.Free3: From the email, select the SIGN IN option and use your email address and the password that we sent you.
Join.AlreadyReg: An administrator with these details is already registered in our database!
Join.Appear: It would appear that you are already registered with
Join.SignInPassword: Sign In, or retrieve your password here
Join.Successful: You've successfully registered yourself as a
Join.SentDetails: and we've sent you login details and along with some further information.
Join.Close: Close this window and check your email.
Join.Check: Check your email for sign in credentials
Join.Team: A member of our Support & Curation Team will be in contact with you shortly.
Join.MobileReg: This mobile number is already registered.
Join.Callback: request a callback from our Customer Support Team
Join.Someone: and someone will be in contact with you.
Join.BothReg: This telephone number and email address have already been registered
Join.Attempt: Someone has attempted to register with a mobile number, or email address, that was already registered.
Join.ASAP: They have requested help, please contact them a.s.a.p:
Join.Critical: We have detected a critical error while registering you as a new user. Our support team have been informed and we will contact you as soon as the problem is resolved.

CMS-Dashboard.GoodWork: Good work so far but we need a bit more information to generate your Single Page Website (SPW). The summary below should indicate which sections still need additional content. Once you've added enough data, the
CMS-Dashboard.Distribute: options will be enabled and we can create your SPW and distribute your content to our partners.

CMS-Dashboard.DataChange:
Thank you.  
We have received your change request and this will be reviewed by the curation
team and updated accordingly.  
Please be aware that you may not see any changes for upto 24 hours.
CMS-Dashboard.ToSee: to see what the SPW will look like with full content added.
CMS-Dashboard.ViewDemo:
Good work so far but we need a bit more information to generate your Single Page Website (SPW). The summary below should indicate which sections still need additional content. Once you've added enough data, the **PREVIEW** and **PUBLISH** options will be enabled and we can create your SPW and distribute your content to our partners.  

You can [view a demo restaurant version]({{ demoUrl }}) top see what the **SPW** will look like with content added.
CMS-Dashboard.Download: Download your website links and QR codes

CMS-Reservations.NoOnlineBookingsMessage: Please ensure that you complete the **General** information section, giving details of how customers can book in advance, outlining your policy regarding reservations and including any special telephone numbers etc.

CMS-SPW-Links.Copy: Copy the SPW link to your clipboard
CMS-SPW-Links.Open: Open published SPW in a new window
CMS-SPW-Links.LinkInfo: The website link, or URL, above is a permanent link to the Single Page Website (SWP) that is automatically generated by Restaurant Collective. This link can be shared with customers or partners via any digital medium.
CMS-SPW-Links.QRInfo: QR Codes are special images that carry information about a website location. Most modern smartphone or tablet devices will recognise and decode these images, via their camera apps, and provide an option to visit the relevant web page directly.
CMS-SPW-Links.Usage: Use these links in any 'offline' situation to provide an easy way for your customers to access the website, or menus, on their smartphone or tablet. You can copy the QR code to your computer using right-click or long-press on the image.
CMS-SPW-Links.SPWInfo: The SPW can also be set up to work on a custom domain (e.g. www.your-domain.com). It can be an existing domain name, or we can register a suitable domain name for you.

Restaurant-Detail.Amend: Amend any fields that need correction, then press UPDATE

SignIn.Introduction:
# Empowering Restaurants
 It’s time someone levelled the playing field for independent operators like you.

Welcome to the Restaurant Collective. We’re a member-owned, non-profit organisation on a mission. We want to empower and champion independent hospitality operators.
SignIn.EnterEmail: Enter your registered email address to reset your password. You may need to check your spam folder.
SignIn.Text1: is a non-profit organisation formed by leading restaurateurs and industry figureheads whose aim is to deliver real day-to-day support to its members.
SignIn.Text2: It is free to become an Associate Member and this includes access to our content management application that has been designed specifically to manage and distribute restaurant content.
SignIn.Subject: This application is subject to the
SignIn.NewPassword: A new password has been sent to your email address
SignIn.Unauth: Unauthorised login attempt - please check your details

Messages.Welcome:
# You're in!

It's great that you've chosen to join Restaurant Collective and we hope that you'll help us to grow this exciting community of industry professionals and independent restaurateurs.

## Add your restaurant

Before you start exploring the Member's Hub, please complete the initial set up by linking your restaurant to your membership account.

When you're ready, select the **START HERE** option below.

Find your restaurant and follow the on-screen instructions to verify the details and link it to your Membership.

If you need any help, then open the **Knowledge Base** and see the **Getting Started** guide.

Referrals.Text1: This is your personal referral code which you can send to your colleagues and associates to encourage them to join you in supporting our collective.
Referrals.Text2: Copy and paste the link into an
Referrals.Social: message or via your favourite social network!

MembershipOptions.Instructions:
Please select your preferred **{{ brand }}** subscription option.

You will be taken to the checkout stage, where you can review your subscription before paying securely online using your preferred method

If you have a **PROMOCODE** then you can apply it at the same time.
MembershipOptions.Terms: Please take the time to read the [Terms of Membership]({{ terms }}) and [Privacy Policy]({{ privacy }}). By becoming a member of Restaurant Collective you are confirming your acceptance of these terms.
